events.content: Software Engineering, Fudan University

details.content: Monitor & Vice-chairperson of Student Union
Second-Class Scholarship & Excellent Student
Build up a solid basement on Computer Science

events.content: Project: IBM Mashup Center 2.0

details.content: A typical Mashup-Tech based product, composed by two parts: Data Source Management Subsystem and Front-End Building Subsystem(with data source)
Developing the Front-End Building Subsystem(like a heavy-weight website building system) with JavaScript, CSS and HTML

1. First try on the rich client application development
2. Learned Front-End techs and Dojo framework
3. Attracted by JavaScript

events.content: Project: Cloud Service System

details.content: A typical IM(Instant Message) and Single Page Application: provide real-time online customer support

Responsible for designing and implementing the front-end part of system:
1. Modularized the application
2. Implemented a Pub/Sub System to enable the communication between modules and make them loosely coupled
3. Implemented cross-domain messaging with HTML5 features

1. Initially understanding with Front-End MVC
2. Got familiar with Long Live Connection and Polling techs

events.content: Project: Intelligent Service Robot System

details.content: A typical IM(Instant Message) and Single Page Application corresponding to the Cloud Service System: Used by the customers of Taobao

Responsible for designing and implementing the front-end part of system:
1. Modularized the application
2. Implemented a Pub/Sub System to enable the communication between modules and make them loosely coupled
3. Implemented cross-domain messaging with HTML5 features

1. Initially understanding with Front-End MVC
2. Got familiar with Long Live Connection and Polling techs

events.content: Translated the book: HTML5: up and running

details.content: Encouraged by XiaoMa(Leader of F2E Team in Taobao), I translated this book into Chinese, which is my first time to do such formal translating work

1. Technical translating is a rigorous physical and mental work
2. Forced myself to dive into every tech details in book
3. Feel really excited to see my name on the book

events.content: Found Trans4Fun

details.content: I found this organization for two reasons: one is there are many people like me who have interests in technical translating and the other is the lack of Chinese resources on Front-End Technology

1. Published several popular works
2. Fixed numbers of team members
3. Focus on project based translating

events.content: Translated JavaScript: The Definitive Guide

details.content: Do the translating work on this book with famous engineers such as YuBo, XiaoMa, SanQi, YiZhou and BaChi. And I learned how to make better cooperation with each other during the process
Improved my translating skill

events.content: Translated The Node Beginner Book

details.content: My first time to do all the preparing and translating works such as contacting the author to get the translating rights, setting up the team, translating the book and so on. Fortunately, our translated book was loved by lots of Node.js Learners
Improved my communication skill with foreigners and organization skill with online teamwork

events.content: Organized the sixth D2 Technology Forum

details.content: As a project manager, I was in charge of organizing this thousands of scale technology forum which is also one of the most famous technology forum focusing on Front-End Technology

1. First time to be the project manager
2. Improved my communication skill with different roles
3. Realized the importance of Plan B
4. Titled Excellent Project Manager by the committee

events.content: Developed the JSSDK of Taobao Open Platform

details.content: JSSDK provides not only an easy way for third-party developers to invoke taobao open API via pure JavaScript but also some common components like LOGIN and SHOPPING CART
Develop the core JSSDK and LOGIN component

1. Got familiar with different type of Cookie(HTTP Only cookie, Session Cookie, etc.)
2. Learned how to self-update third-party components
3. Dived into Cross-Domain Messaging Mechanism

events.content: Emcee of The 7th D2 forum(ADC)

details.content: My first time to be an emcee of such a  thousands of scale technology forum, as a result, I impressed all the attendant

1. My emcee skill on tech conference was improved
2. Good at how to express as an emcee

events.content: Developed New Homepage

details.content: New Homepage  is a heavy-weight mashup-style system. Such works like rendering widget and communicating among widgets are all handled in the front-end
Develop all the front part of the features of new homepage for b1302 and cooperate with back-end engineer in America

1. Built up my strong skills on researching on new project
2. Improved my skill on cross-contry team work

events.content: Developed NProxy(Fiddler-like Debug Tool)

details.content: NProxy is a Fiddler-like but cross-platform tool for deveper to debug with compressed and merged JavaScript/CSS files, which, mostly focus on file replacing. It is now widely used in SuccessFactors, TMall and Tecent, etc.
Responsible for all the design and develop work of NProxy

Dived into Node.js
2. Got more familar with HTTP and HTTPS

events.content: Organizer and Emcee of 2012 JSConf China - Hu.js

details.content: As one of the organizers in China, I worked with the two founders Troy and Glenn to host this amazing JavaScript event in Shanghai, China. This is a really awesome experience for me to make a conference with foreign friends from scratch

1. Oral english skill was improved
2. Learned much from Troy and Glenn
3. Good to be an emcee in an international conference

events.content: MDF(Meta Data Framework) Lead UI Engineer

details.content: MDF is one of the most important project, which is being developed by three teams from U.S, India and China. The goal of MDF is to provide an easy-to-use framework for module teams to build an application by defining objects, schema and logic.
Responsible for design, development of all the MDF UI

1. Skill of System design was improved
2. Learnt how to cooperate with developers with different culture from different countries, especially India

events.content: Organizer and Emcee of 2013 JSConf China - Jing.js

details.content: Jing.js is an international JavaScript technology conference, which was hosted in Beijing, China. We had more than 20 speakers all over the world, 5 big sponsors(Microsoft, Github, Netease, Baidu) and more than 500 attendees in Jing.js.

1. Proud of making it come true in Beijing with remotely working in Shanghai
2. Getting more familiar with business about hosting a technology conference

events.content: Producer of QCon Shanghai

details.content: QCon is one of the biggest technology conference in China and I was so honored to be the producer of the JavaScript Session of this conference. And finally, this session was popular and titled as the best session
Responsible for inviting the speakers and Emcee.

1. Learnt how to deal with urgent matters
2. Emcee skill is improved

events.content: Translated Programming in CoffeeScript and Smashing Node.js

details.content:
1. Translating skill is improved
2. Dive into Node.js while translating the book

events.content: MDF Config UI Lead UI Engineer

details.content: MDF Config UI helps our customers and developers to rapidly develop web application based on MDF objects, which can be considered as a website builder tool
Resposible for architect design and development

1. Skill of System design was improved
2. Learnt how to cooperate with developers with different culture from different countries, especially India

events.content: Build the first UI Common team in Shanghai

details.content: Build the first UI Common team in shanghai (only in U.S and India)
Resposible for evaluating the tech members
1. Learnt more about how to build a team

events.content: Found and design/develop New Config UI

details.content: To meet more requirements from all sorts of customers all over the world, I designed a new config ui project based on the drawbacks of current config ui and developed it with new UI Common team

1. Arch skill from scratch gets improved
2. Learnt how to introduce a new project cross-team

events.content: Organizer and Emcee of 2014 JSConf China - Hang.js

details.content: Hang.js is an international JavaScript technology conference, which was hosted in Hangzhou, China. We had more than 20 speakers all over the world, 8 sponsors and more than 600 attendees in Hang.js.
1. Improved the skill of marketing
